revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = Particle fountain | class = ParticleFountain }}[[Classes]]: ParticleFountain
 →[[Classes:BlackParticleFountain|BlackParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:BlueParticleFountain|BlueParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:GreenParticleFountain|GreenParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:PurpleParticleFountain|PurpleParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:RedParticleFountain|RedParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:WhiteParticleFountain|WhiteParticleFountain]]
 →[[Classes:YellowParticleFountain|YellowParticleFountain]]
Base class for all [[particle]] fountains. Since they set the NOBLOCKMAP and NOGRAVITY flags, they are not linked to sector movement; to make a particle fountain on a moving sector a new actor [[using inheritance|derived]] from one of the children classes and with these flags cleared should be created and used. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ParticleFountain native { {{Property|Height}} 0 +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} +{{Flag|INVISIBLE}} }
